articles.title: Rugby-Last-gasp try hands Argentina series win over Scotland
articles.description: Argentina’s other tries were scored by Santiago Carreras, Nahuel Tetaz Chapparo and substitute scrumhalf Gonzalo Bertranou, whose opportunistic effort 13 minutes from time turned the test in the Los Pumas’ favour. Ewan Ashman and Duhan van der Merwe scored two tries each for Scotland with Blair Kinghorn adding four conversions and a penalty.
articles.content:
A rgentina's Emiliano Boffelli scored a last-gasp try as they snatched a dramatic 34-31 win over Scotland in the third test on Saturday after coming from 15 points down to win the series.

articles.title: Nordea Open: Sebastian Baez Sets Up Final With Compatriot Cerundolo, Overcomes Andrey Rublev
articles.description: Argentina's Sebastian Baez produced a dominant performance to reach the final of the Nordea Open, beating Russia's Andrey Rublev in the semifinal, in Bastad, Sweden on Saturday.
articles.content:
Argentina’s Sebastian Baez produced a dominant performance to reach the final of the Nordea Open, beating Russia’s Andrey Rublev in the semifinal, in Bastad, Sweden on Saturday.

articles.title: Nordea Open: Argentine Francisco Cerundolo Cruises Past Carreno Busta to Reach Final
articles.description: Continuing his impressive 2022 season, Argentina's Francisco Cerundolo delivered another accomplished all-around showing to register a 6-3, 6-2 semifinal win over fifth seed Pablo Carreno Busta and reach the final of the Nordea Open, taking place in Bastad, Sweden on Saturday.

articles.title: Differences Between US and Argentina When Raising Kids Around Drugs
articles.description: The author shares how her children have had access to marijuana and wine earlier than they would've in the US and says that has made them responsible.
articles.content:
I moved from the suburbs of Michigan to a small town in Argentina in 2009.
My kids at the time were 8, 6, and 4 years old.
Drugs were everywhere as my kids grew up, but now I know how beneficial that was for them.
